summary: This document is an email from Anastasia Dubov regarding the movement of securities between various accounts associated with Southern Financial and Southern Trust. The email includes instructions for holding and transferring positions in different accounts and is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Anastasia Dubov
persons.context: Anastasia Dubov is the sender of the email, providing instructions related to the movement of securities.

persons.name: Harr Beller
persons.context: Harr Beller is a recipient of the email, included in the correspondence regarding the securities movement.

persons.name: Aman Kir
persons.context: Aman Kir is copied on the email, indicating involvement in the securities transaction.

keyFacts: The email discusses the movement of securities between accounts at Southern Financial and Southern Trust.
Anastasia Dubov is the sender of the email, providing instructions for the transactions.
The email is marked as confidential and includes disclaimers regarding the information contained within.
There are multiple accounts mentioned with specific identifiers for holding positions.
The email was sent on October 1, 2013.
